content: of sole k2tog k1 round 2 plain round work all sts as they appear i e knit the knit sts purl the purl sts repeat this 2 rounds until you have 36 sts left then always work round 1 until there are 16 sts left finishing leaving a tail of at least 8 inches break yarn and close the toe using kitchener stitch weave in the ends then knit a second sock and enjoy about this pattern the plot of the innocents a 1961 british horror film directed and produced by jack clayton as well as the libretto of a 20th century english chamber opera composed by benjamin britten is based on the novella the turn of the screw 1898 by henry james falling within the subgenre of psychological horror the plot achieves many of its effects through its special setting the story takes place on the grounds of bly a remote country mansion in essex england the house is old and creepy and from the very beginning has the air of a haunted place as the story goes on the whole estate feels more and more claustrophobic the lattice pattern of the socks with its twists and noose-like knots depicts the suffocating atmosphere of that strange and sinister place called bly ____ ©caoua coffee 2012 this pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved there s one exception you are explicitly encouraged to make or sell items made from this pattern for charity purposes if you have error reports or any suggestions concerning this pattern you can contact me on ravelry as caoua coffee ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved bly v 1 1 page 5/5
